mapper.select: select wms_cre_housing_att_id, data_type, attachment_old_name, attachment_new_name, attachment_address, attachment_type, wms_cre_credit_head_id, create_user_id, create_user_name, date_format(create_timestamp,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_timestamp_str, create_timestamp, last_update_user_id, date_format(last_update_timestamp,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as last_update_timestamp_str, last_update_timestamp, enable_flag from wms_cre_credit_att where wms_cre_housing_att_id = #{wms_cre_housing_att_id}
select count(wms_cre_housing_att_id) as count from wms_cre_credit_att
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO wms_cre_credit_att (
data_type,
attachment_old_name,
attachment_new_name,
attachment_address,
attachment_type,
wms_cre_credit_head_id,
create_user_id,
create_user_name,
create_timestamp,
last_update_user_id,
last_update_timestamp,
enable_flag ) VALUES ( #{data_type}, #{attachment_old_name}, #{attachment_new_name}, #{attachment_address}, #{attachment_type}, #{wms_cre_credit_head_id}, #{create_user_id}, #{create_user_name}, #{create_timestamp}, #{last_update_user_id}, #{last_update_timestamp}, #{enable_flag} );
mapper.update:
update wms_cre_credit_att
wms_cre_housing_att_id = #{wms_cre_housing_att_id},
data_type = #{data_type},
attachment_old_name = #{attachment_old_name},
attachment_new_name = #{attachment_new_name},
attachment_address = #{attachment_address},
attachment_type = #{attachment_type},
wms_cre_credit_head_id = #{wms_cre_credit_head_id},
create_user_id = #{create_user_id},
create_user_name = #{create_user_name},
create_timestamp = #{create_timestamp},
last_update_user_id = #{last_update_user_id},
last_update_timestamp = #{last_update_timestamp},
enable_flag = #{enable_flag},
where wms_cre_housing_att_id = #{wms_cre_housing_att_id}
